body:
Comment 93: 
Andy, here is something else for you to try.  Update to tip.  Edit
src/pkg/runtime/mgc0.c.  Change the value of IgnorePreciseGC, near the top of the file,
from 0 to 1.  Rebuild go.  Use the rebuilt go to rebuild your program.  See if it
crashes.  This will help us understand whether the new precise GC in Go 1.1 is related
to this crash.  Thanks!
